template.name: Template Dell SNMP TRAP (iDRAC 7 e 8)
template.description: Template SNMP iDRAC-MIB-SMIv2 - alertTrapGroup Generated by mib2zabbix

item.name: SNMP Trap: IDRAC-MIB-SMIv2::alertAmperageProbeFailure
item.description:
Current sensor has detected a failure value.
Varbinds: 0. alertMessageID (OCTETSTR) Message ID of the event.
1. alertMessage (OCTETSTR) Message describing the alert.
2. alertCurrentStatus (INTEGER) Current status of object causing the alert, if applicable.
3. alertSystemServiceTag (OCTETSTR) Service tag of the system.
4. alertSystemFQDN (OCTETSTR) Fully qualified domain name of the system.
5. alertFQDD (OCTETSTR) Fully qualified device descriptor of the device.
6. alertDeviceDisplayName (OCTETSTR) Display name of the device/FQDD.
7. alertMessageArguments (OCTETSTR) Concatenated set of strings representing the message arguments of the event. Each message argument string is enclosed in double quotes, and there is a comma after the ending double quote of each message argument string, except the last one. Any double quotes found within a message argument string are preprocessed and changed to single quotes.
8. alertChassisServiceTag (OCTETSTR) For modular systems, the service tag of the enclosing chassis. For rack and tower systems, this varbind will be empty (zero length).
9. alertChassisName (OCTETSTR) For modular systems, the chassis name of the enclosing chassis. For rack and tower systems, this varbind will be empty (zero length).
10. alertRacFQDN (OCTETSTR) Fully qualified domain name of the remote access card.
